name: EA's spaceBattle
description:
Venture trough space and time, fighting hordes of ennemies ! But will you be able to confront your worst nightmare?

Maybe your worst ennemies won't be the ships shooting at you, but the game and the industry in itself...

(This is intended as a parody and a satire, not as a real game. Do not try to play it seriously, there is way better shmups out there ^^ )

controls : 

arrow and space to move and validate

mouse to interact with in-app purchases

Have fun ^^

Made for the ludum dare 40, with theme "The more you have, the worse it is" (The more you have achievement and In-app purchases, the worse it is :p )
